name: TEAM13 - Prends garde, Kiko !
description:
Help Kiko the penguin escape from a dangerous world !

In this 2.5D platformer game, you will be able to control Kiko, a strong penguin, and try to escape from the hazards caused by climate change !

To be able to win, you will need to adjust the global temperature while running with Kiko !

Here is how to install and run the game :

  • Scroll down to the bottom of the page
  • Click the download button
  • Unzip the zip files
  • Execute the exe file
  • Enjoy the game !

Note : Please make sure you are playing on Windows !

This game was created during the Balance Game Jam as a collaboration between Japanese and Belgian students working in the game making industry !

Our team had only four days to make an entire game, and here is the result ! Most of us are unexperienced but we are really proud of the final product !

The background music use is a free to use music found here.

We would also like to give a huge thanks to every trainer and translator who helped us making this game !

Have fun playing our game !
